from sys import stdin
for _ in range(int(stdin.readline())):
    (n, k) = map(int, stdin.readline().split())
    s = stdin.readline().strip()
    x1 = s[:n // 2]
    x2 = s[:-(n + 1) // 2:-1]
    t = sum((a != b for (a, b) in zip(x1, x2)))
    print('NO' if k < t or (n % 2 == 0 and k % 2 != t % 2) else 'YES')

from sys import stdin
for _ in range(int(stdin.readline())):
    (n, k) = map(int, stdin.readline().split())
    s = stdin.readline().strip()
    a1 = s[:n // 2]
    a2 = s[:-(n + 1) // 2:-1]
    t = sum((a != b for (a, b) in zip(a1, a2)))
    print('NO' if k < t or (n % 2 == 0 and k % 2 != t % 2) else 'YES')
